attention3.ptxt: For identification of each cylinder and bank, refer to Precaution for Identification of Cylinder and Bank:N32A .

servinfosub.title: System Description
servinfosub.ptxt: ECM measure the angle of the crankshaft based on the pulse signal from the CKP sensor and CMP sensor for each cylinder. If it detects a large change in the angle speed of the crankshaft, it concludes occurrence of a misfire. When the number of misfire is counted by ECM beyond the DTC detecting condition, it determine the cylinder where the misfire occurred and output it as DTC.

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met.

item.ptxt: Misfire rates at 2 or more cylinders exceeds specified misfire rate which causes damaged to catalytic converter.
(MIL flashes as long as this misfire occurs continuously)
Misfire rates at 2 or more cylinders exceeds specified misfire rate which adversely affects exhaust emission.
Fuel (pressure, fuel shortage or fuel of poor quality)
Air intake system
Exhaust system
Ignition system
Fuel system
Engine mechanical system
ECM

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met.

item.ptxt: Misfire rate at specified cylinder exceeds specified misfire rate which causes damaged to catalytic converter.
(MIL flashes as long this misfire occurs continuously)
Misfire rate at specified cylinder exceeds specified misfire rate which adversely affects exhaust emission.
When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out with 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.
If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.
Check to make sure that following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.
Fuel level ≥ 15.0%
In case it is suspected that inferior quality fuel is mixed into the fuel tank, replace all the fuel in the tank with high quality one.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Drive vehicle at 40 – 50 km/h (25 – 31 mile/h) for 5 min.
Run engine at idle speed for 5 min.
Drive vehicle at condition of freeze frame data (Engine speed, engine load, etc.) memorized in ECM for several minutes.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.question: Does fuel level meter indicate “E” level (empty)?

testgroup.title: Air intake system and exhaust system inspection

test1.ptxt: Check air intake system, exhaust system, vacuum hoses and PCV hoses for clogging or leakage.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: Fuel injector and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check that fuel injector and its circuit is as follows.

item.ptxt: Fuel injector circuit:
Fuel injector:

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check engine mechanical parts or system which can cause engine rough idle or poor performance.

item.ptxt: Engine compression:
Ignition timing:

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
